lore: The number of Revenants that live underwater is unknown. However, several studies financed by the government of Omnia centuries ago determined that their population easily doubled that of surface creatures.\n\nThe Revenant Captain's shield is a powerful artifact that is rarely used for protection. Learning how to wield it requires a lot of effort and training for several years. With practice, the wielder can channel the pain from its wounds to deliver devastating blows on its enemies.
menagerieDialog: It's a common misconception that all Revenants like to fight. I, for one, would prefer to lead a quiet life and dedicate myself to collecting minerals.
What's wrong? You look like a fish out of water.\n\nHA!
(Revenants hate when you call them "fish people". Never make that mistake.)
I am not a fish. I am NOT. A FISH.\n\n(This is the most sensitive fish you've ever met.)
(It smells like dead fish. Probably because that's exactly what it is.)
name: Revenant Captain
